casebody.data:
In re Lyon. (Supreme Court, General Term, First Department. January 28, 1889.) Appeal from special term, New York county. Dore Lyon appeals from an order denying his motion to vacate an assessment.

Argued before Van Bhunt, P. J^ and Brady and Macomber, JJ.

J. A. Deering, for appellant. G. L. Sterling, for respondent. Brady, J.

For the reasons stated in the opinion in Re IAvingston, ante, 56, (decided herewith,) the order appealed from should he affirmed, with $10 costs and disbursements. All concur.
